config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  readonly single_input="${target_path}"
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 1 ]]; then
  echo 'Expecting single input' >&2
  exit 1
elif [[ "${#}" -eq 1 ]]; then
  readonly single_input="${1}"
else
  echo 'Either a valid input or configuration is required' >&2
  exit 1
fi

case "${out_format}" in
  base64) base64 "${single_input}" | tr -d '\n';;
  hex) xxd -plain "${single_input}" | tr -d '\n';;
  *) echo "Invalid representation: ${out_format}" >&2; exit 1;;
esac
